name: Mountain Photographer
description:
Mountain Photographer is a platformer made during the Potat0sJam8. The theme of the jam was "Another point of view" or "Another perpective" ("Un autre point de vue" in French).

In this game, you play as a photographer climbing a mountain. Your goal is to get to the viewpoint at the top of the mountain while taking pictures of the wild animals that you will encounter.

The game is playable with a keyboard or a controller. Controller is recommended.

If you want to try to beat my best time, here it is: 1 minute 36 seconds and 2 milliseconds!
